And then let's talk about the anti Sharia protests that happened over the weekend in the U.S.
The rallies were held in two dozen cities on Saturday
They were reportedly organized by a group called Act for America
Act for America describes themselves as the NRA for National Security. Whereas the Southern Poverty law center calls them the largest grassroots
